meanings.definition: buffest: superlative form of buff, meaning having well-developed muscles
meanings.sent1: He is the buffest guy in our gym, with muscles that are strong and big.
meanings.sent2: The bodybuilder won the competition because he was the buffest of them all.
meanings.sent3: The buffest man in town challenged everyone to an arm-wrestling contest.
meanings.sent4: Her buffest friend always lifts her spirits when she's feeling down.
meanings.sent5: The buffest superhero in the comic saved the city from disaster with his incredible strength.

meanings.definition: buffest: superlative form of buff, meaning polished or cleaned to a shine
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her buffest silverware at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: After hours of polishing, the antique mirror was the buffest it had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The buffest car in the showroom gleamed under the bright lights.
meanings.sent4: Her buffest shoes sparkled as she walked down the red carpet.
meanings.sent5: The buffest trophy on the shelf shone with pride, a symbol of hard work and dedication.
